title: Dungeon Defense (WN)
alternateTitles: ダンジョンディフェンス

metadata.title: Dungeon Defense (WN)
alternateTitles: ダンジョンディフェンス
metadata.description:
Do you know how this world ends?

Become the hero and take down the 72 Demon Lords. The game that was boasted as the absolute hardest strategy game, 『Dungeon Attack』.

I used to be the ‘hero’ that had accomplished everything in this game, but after answering a suspicious survey, I found myself in the game as the weakest Demon Lord, 「Dantalian」.

With only my eloquent tongue and my memories of conquest as a hero—.

In order to survive as Dantalian. I shall tear this world apart.
metadata.author: 유헌화 (Yoo Heonhwa)

versions.description: This is the web novel (WN) version of Dungeon Defense, featuring the original unedited storyline as published online. This version includes extensive footnotes and character illustrations from the original publication. The translation prioritizes accuracy and preserving the author's original voice, with detailed explanations of Korean cultural references and wordplay.
